<p><strong>Loading & Downloading Data</strong>

::: {.justify}
Most datasets used in the Handbook are available through the R package
<code>DATAstudio</code>. Datasets can be downloaded with the <code>DATAstudio</code> command
<code>dataset()</code>. For instance:
:::
```r
## DOWNLOADING A PACKAGE WITH COMMAND 'DATASET'
install.packages("DATAstudio")
library(DATAstudio)
dataset("lisbon")
?lisbon
```
